lines.line: Well, hello there. And welcome- to Act Two! Things have changed here a bit Since last we saw each other, so I'll bring you upâ€˜to speed on a few things. As you may remember, the rebel poor under Bobby's leadership kidnapped Hope and used her as a shield to escape due punishment from my... man. Word has it they're holed up in some secret hideout somewhere. Perhaps this one- here.
Where the hell is Bobby?! And Little Sally?! And Old Ma Strong?! They should have been back by now.
Ah, who are we kiddin'? The police probably nabbed them hours ago. It's just a matter of time before our whereabouts are tortured out of them. And then it'll be off to Urinetown for the lot of us.
Wha- what's it like, do you think?
Urinetown? Don't even ask.
No one knows for sure.
I got my suspicions.
Oh yeah?
Sure, kid, everyone's got suspicions.
So don't get your hopes up. And I say if they're not back soon, we give it to her like her father was gonna give it to us.

People hear lots of things about Urinetown, of course, and that's just the way we like it. For example, a little boy once asked me, "Is Urinetown actually a nice place to live? Gingerbread houses along golden, frothy canals? Like Venice, but different?" I didn't say yes. I didn't say no either.
I want them found, damn it! I want my daughter released and I want Bobby Strong punished!
We're working round the Clock, Sir. But as the sign says, it is a secret hideout, so-
Enough of your excuses, Lockstock! You've got weapons! Use them!
But, sir-
We should hurry, sir. The Emergency Planning Quorum is waiting.
Yes, of course. The Quorum.
That was a close one, Bobby. I thought Barrel saw us there for sure.
We'll have to keep on our toes, Ma. At least until we've distributed the rest of these memos to the other assistant custodians around the city.
Do you think they'll join us?
Hard to say. They're scared like we used to be scared, but if it's true what they say about everyone having a heart, they'll have to join us.
Your heart is like a stallion?
I'll explain along the way, Ma. C'mon, let's go.
Where are they hiding, Little Sally?! Tell me and I'll see things go easy on you.
Easy on me?! You mean like sending me to the nice part of Urinetown?!
That can be arranged.
Save it for one of your other stoolies, Officer Lockstock. My heart's with the rebellion. And besides, the way I see it, I'm already in Urinetown. We all are. Even you.
Me? In Urinetown?
Sure. The way I see it, Urinetown isn't so much a a place as it is a metaphysical place.
Where'd she go?! Damn it. Welcome back, everybody. And enjoy- what's left of the show! Little Sally... Little Sally... What did you mean by "metaphysical"?
